schema.database: select rr ||0x01030307 r from( select 0x04 ||trim(t.schema_name) ||'${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}'rr from (select distinct schema_name from iischema)t, (select distinct schema_name from iischema)t1 where t.schema_name>=t1.schema_name group by 1 {limit} )a
schema.table: select rr ||0x01030307 r from( select 0x04 ||trim(t.table_name) ||'${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}'rr from (select distinct table_name from iiingres_tables where table_owner='${DATABASE}')t, (select distinct table_name from iiingres_tables where table_owner='${DATABASE}')t1 where t.table_name>=t1.table_name group by 1 {limit} )a
schema.column: select rr ||0x01030307 r from( select 0x04 ||trim(t.column_name) ||'${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}'rr from (select distinct column_name from iiocolumns where table_owner='${DATABASE}'and table_name='${TABLE}')t, (select distinct column_name from iiocolumns where table_owner='${DATABASE}'and table_name='${TABLE}')t1 where t.column_name>=t1.column_name group by 1 {limit} )a

row.query: select rr ||0x01030307 r from( select 0x04 ||trim(t.s) ||'${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}'rr from (select distinct ${FIELDS} s from "${DATABASE}".${TABLE})t, (select distinct ${FIELDS} s from "${DATABASE}".${TABLE})t1 where t.s>=t1.s group by 1 {limit} )a
